H0.text: Birds that eat fish from shallow waters are the organisms most affected by the increase in sea level associated with global warming.

H1.text: Fish that live in coral reefs in shallow waters will be most affected by the sea‑level rise expected from global warming.

H2.text: Mammals that swim in cold, deep ocean waters are the organisms most affected by the sea‑level rise that results from global warming.

H3.text: Crustaceans at the bottom of deep‑sea ocean waters are the organisms most affected by the rise in sea level that results from global temperature increases.
